Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Bryn Mawr due to unauthorized persons on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Bryn Mawr due to unauthorized persons on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • Shuttle buses are requested from Howard to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
